title: Ketu Transit in the 4th House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting your fourth house brings detachment from emotional security, home comforts, and familiar attachments. You may feel inwardly distant even while surrounded by family or material support. Changes related to residence, property, or inner peace can arise quietly. This phase reduces dependence on external comfort and pushes you to find stability within. When accepted consciously, Ketu here deepens emotional maturity and creates a calm, self-contained inner foundation.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Sense of comfort becomes less place-dependent.

sections.heading: Career
points: Preference for work with emotional independence.
Home-based or low-visibility roles suit better.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Emotional distance from family may be felt.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Lower attachment to property or assets.

closing: Ketu in the 4th house shifts comfort inward. When inner peace replaces dependency, emotional stability becomes unshakeable.
